name: Digital-Edge
tag_list: data-center, cloud-implementation, monitoring, it, back-end, technology, server-support, enterprise-environment-support
overview:
Digital Edge is a highly-specialized technology organization focused on supporting back-end technology services within datacenters. This company is all about helping clients build and maintain their IT environments, by providing technical expertise and solutions for success. Whether an environment is collocated within one of Digital Edge’s facilities or is at a clientâ€™s main site, Digital Edge can monitor, manage, and upgrade all aspects of the clients IT environment. One of the primary concepts of Digital Edge is that “satisfactory” is just not enough, where Digital Edge takes a step further in 24/7 support service, recognizing that any downtime can be detrimental to a business. Since technology failure results from a lack of architectural design or failure in support processes, Digital Edge has ZERO tolerance for technical failures and mishaps.

Digital Edge has taken an extra step further when it comes to client dedication by concentrating on making sure that IT is covered, keeping the important business processes where they should beâ€¦ â€œTop Priorityâ€. Their team holds multiple certifications in all areas including Cisco, Oracle, Microsoft, and Redhat, where their security team members follow all industry security developments, participate in hacking discussions, verify reported exploits and code weaknesses, and continually reprogram their monitoring systems to include new vulnerabilities in scheduled scans. Digital Edge’s data center supports hundreds of servers and dozens of globally-diversified networks and while constantly runs their R&D lab to test and identify best solutions and practices, providing clients with the highest possible return on investment (ROI).

With Digital Edge IT operations become agile, smooth-running utilities-and as a result, businesses thrive.
